references.paper_title: A distributional perspective on reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper introduces the distributional perspective to reinforcement learning, which is the foundation of the proposed distributional Monte-Carlo planning methods.

references.paper_title: The arcade learning environment: An evaluation platform for general agents
references.reason: This paper introduces the Arcade Learning Environment, a benchmark used to evaluate the performance of the proposed algorithms in the experiments.

references.paper_title: A survey of monte carlo tree search methods
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of Monte Carlo Tree Search methods, which are the basis of the algorithms proposed in this work.
This paper introduces the Upper Confidence Bounds applied to Trees (UCT) algorithm, a widely used method for action selection in Monte Carlo Tree Search that is compared against the proposed methods.

references.paper_title: Nonasymptotic analysis of monte carlo tree search
references.reason: This paper provides a non-asymptotic analysis of the convergence rate of Monte Carlo Tree Search, which is compared against the theoretical results of the proposed method
